title: I Perma unlocked a skin with orange essence (520) and i dont have the skin
body: I perma unlocked Old Saint Zilean but when I went to champion select and picked Zilean it showed that I had no skin for him

replies.body: Looking at the account you're posting form, I wasn't able to locate any recent skins that were unlocked through hextech crafting.  I do see back on the 29th you received a Time Machine Zilean shard, and disenchanted it for 173 orange essences.  I hope that helps clear things up, but let me know!
